title: [Whistler's Pass, Alpine Tundra]
description: A small, shallow pond of crystal clear water lies to one side of the trail.  A plain stone bench provides a comfortable spot to look into the water, though all that can be seen is a scintillating reflection of the starry night sky.

A small, shallow pond of crystal clear water lies to one side of the trail.  A plain stone bench provides a comfortable spot to look into the water, though all that can be seen is a dazzling reflection of the clear blue sky.
